title: Desert Fathers & Early Christian Monasticism
description: The sayings and lives of the Egyptian desert fathers who pioneered Christian monasticism in the 3rd-5th centuries, plus John Cassian's systematic presentation of desert spirituality for the West.
keyTexts: Apophthegmata Patrum: Sayings of the Desert Fathers - wisdom in brief narratives
Cassian's Institutes: Systematic presentation of Egyptian monasticism for Western audience
Anonymous Sayings: Additional collection of monastic wisdom
researchValue: Foundational texts of Christian monasticism. The Apophthegmata influenced all subsequent monastic spirituality, East and West. Cassian transmitted desert spirituality to Benedict and Western monasticism.
